channel.title: The best program for OneTimePad management?
channel.description:
/wiki/One_Time_Pad
Awesome article! However, onetime isn't available for Whonix 16. Any recommendations (workarounds)? I would love to have a working app for One Time Pads.

item.title: The best program for OneTimePad management?
item.dc:creator: otpq
item.description:
What about this one? OneTime  —  Encryption with One-Time Pads

What source of entropy should be used? Can a VM provide enough entropy to support the encryption of OneTime Pads?

Read full topic
item.source: The best program for OneTimePad management?
